about_the_game:
Freebooter of SPLORR!! is a minimalist dungeon crawler where you take the role of the freebooter. A freebooter is a "lawless adventurer". SPLORR!! is a rough place.

After an all night binge drinking session, you awaken in a dungeon maze filled with monsters. But at least you still have yer trousers.

In order to leave this dungeon, you will need to combat all of its denizens. These can be anything from the introductory Evil Bat all the way up to the might Wyvern.

Is this dungeon maze real, or is it all in yer head? I leave that to the interpretation of the player.

To combat the monster, be they real or imagined, it is not a matter of melee prowess, but a matter of... successfully predicting whether the next card drawn will be higher or lower than the previous.

Along the way, you'll get hungry. You'll need food. You will need courage and alertness in order to better combat yer foes!

Fortunately, the dungeon is filled with helpful items like beer and wine, to help you be courageous. Coffee to help keep you alert.

And above all else, there are Jools Galore!

Defeat all of the enemies, and emerge victoriously with your hard-won Jools!

Get defeated, and the grim reaper will mock you.

In either case, try to keep yer trousers on, and for all our sakes, try not to soil them!

content_descriptors.notes:
Use of alcohol as an essential tool for playing and winning the game.
Crude humor. You can poop your trousers.

detailed_description:
Freebooter of SPLORR!! is a minimalist dungeon crawler where you take the role of the freebooter. A freebooter is a "lawless adventurer". SPLORR!! is a rough place.

After an all night binge drinking session, you awaken in a dungeon maze filled with monsters. But at least you still have yer trousers.

To combat the monster, be they real or imagined, it is not a matter of melee prowess, but a matter of... successfully predicting whether the next card drawn will be higher or lower than the previous.

name: Freebooter of SPLORR!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Supports SDL2
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports SDL_Mixer2
  • Additional Notes: The needs of this game are modest for a modern PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual
Drogas lícitas

short_description: A retro style dungeon crawling parody game where you drink beer to improve your attack and try not to poop your pants while collecting jools!
